tool_description: Compares performance metrics and audience characteristics across multiple social media platforms to identify strengths and opportunities.

platforms_to_compare.description: Array of platform names to compare

comparison_metrics.description: Metrics to use for platform comparison

normalization_approach.description: Approach for normalizing cross-platform metrics (relative, absolute, percentage)

error_messages: Insufficient platforms: At least 2 platforms required for meaningful comparison
Invalid comparison metrics: Some specified metrics are not available across all platforms
Missing platform data: One or more platforms lack sufficient data for comparison
Invalid normalization approach: Must be one of [relative, absolute, percentage]
usage: Specify platforms_to_compare array and comparison_metrics. Choose appropriate normalization_approach for fair cross-platform comparison based on your analysis needs.

comparative_scores.description: Normalized performance scores for each platform

platform_strengths.description: Key strengths identified for each platform
